articles.title: Fewer than half of Americans view leaders of Canada, UK, Germany and Israel favorably
articles.description: Less than half of Americans view favorably the leaders of top U.S. allies including Canada, Britain, Germany, and Israel, according to a new poll.A...

articles.title: Trump says no concessions on Turkey tariffs
articles.description: President Trump on Monday said he isn't concerned that tit-for-tat tariffs will harm Europe's economy while vowing not to make any concessions with Turkey to free a U.S. pastor being detained there.Trump told Reute...

articles.author: Ali Breland
articles.title: Facebook to remove over 5,000 ad target options to curb discrmination
articles.description: In the fall after the options are removed, advertisers will no longer be able to exclude certain religions and races in their targeted ads on Facebook.

articles.title: Foreign Relations senators push back on WH aid cut
articles.description: The top Republican and Democrat on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee are pushing back against a White House plan to block foreign aid funds."We have a letter going out to the administration this evening. We ar...

articles.author: Brett Samuels
articles.title: Omarosa to speak out against Trump for duration of midterm cycle
articles.description: Former White House aide Omarosa Manigault Newman said Monday she will speak out against President Trump for the duration of the midterm cycle, painting herself to The Wall Street Journal as a member of the "resistance."...

articles.title: How Trump's corporate disclosure proposal could change investing
articles.description: President Trump's recent call for fewer corporate disclosures extended unprecedented White House backing for an issue that's had the support of some of the nation's top CEOs for years.Trump on Fr...

articles.title: Democratic Senate hopeful Raybould launches statewide TV ad
articles.description: LINCOLN, Neb. (AP) — Democratic U.S. Senate hopeful Jane Raybould has released a new statewide television ad highlighting her work in her family's grocery store chain.

articles.author: Jeff Cox
articles.title: Dollar heads lower a day after Trump rips Fed and calls China and EU currency manipulators
articles.description: President Donald Trump is getting his wish, at least for a day: The U.S. dollar is losing ground Tuesday a day after he said he's disappointed with the Federal Reserve's intention to keep hiking interest rates.

articles.author: Jeff Daniels
articles.title: California governor blasts Trump move to scrap Obama greenhouse gas plan as 'war against America'
articles.description: California Gov. Jerry Brown on Tuesday lashed out at the Trump administration's plan to roll back the Obama-era Clean Power Plan and help coal-burning power plants.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: The problem with Trump whining about the Fed and interest rates
articles.description: Donald Trump was for higher interest rates before he was against them.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil nods up on U.S. sanctions against Iran, but America's trade dispute with China weighs
articles.description: Oil prices were up on Tuesday amid expectations of supply cuts when the U.S. sanctions on Iran go into effect in November, but overall sentiment remains cautious from the potential impact of Sino-U.S. trade relations on the outlook for fuel demand.

articles.author: By YURI KAGEYAMA AP Business Writer
articles.title: Asian shares mixed on doubt of resolving US-China trade spat
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — Asian shares were mixed Tuesday amid doubts on the prospects for resolving the trade dispute between the U.S. and China.

articles.title: Louisiana senator part of delegation to Guatemala, Mexico
articles.description: BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) — U.S. Sen. Bill Cassidy was part of a recent congressional trip to Guatemala and Mexico that the Louisiana Republican said involved discussions of border security, drug trafficking and trade.

articles.title: Nats throw in towel, trade Murphy to Cubs, Adams to Cards
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Washington Nationals have traded second baseman Daniel Murphy to the Chicago Cubs and first baseman Matt Adams to the St. Louis Cardinals, essentially throwing in the towel on a disappointing season.

articles.title: Trump returning to campaign in West Virginia
articles.description: CHARLESTON, W.Va. (AP) — President Donald Trump is making his sixth visit to West Virginia since taking office.

articles.title: Alaska seafood organization seeks comments on US tariffs
articles.description: KENAI, Alaska (AP) — An Alaska seafood organization is encouraging industry members to comment on the proposed U.S. tariffs on products imported from China that could negatively affect the state's seafood industry.

articles.author: By JOHN PERROTTO Associated Press
articles.title: 20-year-old Wilson pitches Braves past Pirates 1-0 in debut
articles.description: PITTSBURGH (AP) — Bryse Wilson worked five solid innings, becoming the third 20-year-old pitcher to start in his big league debut for Atlanta this season in the Braves' 1-0 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates on Monday night.
